languages.text: Обретя видение нового пути, Кибелла отдалась чувству, вспыхнувшему между ней и Домин. Презрев роль телохранительницы и наложницы, она стала для Лорд-капитана кем-то большим. Нити Кровавой паутины дрогнули, и новый долг лег на нее — отныне среди слуг Неумирающего каждый Домин мог отыскать не только преданного защитника, но также и священную жену или мужа.

Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.

languages.text: Kibellahs Vision eines neues Weges ließ sie dem Gefühl nachgeben, das zwischen ihr und {mf|dem|der} Domin entstanden war. Sie gab ihre Rolle als Leibwächterin und Gefährtin auf, um für den Lord Captain weit mehr zu werden. Die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes zitterten, als sich eine neue Aufgabe offenbarte. Von nun an konnte ein Domin unter den Dienern des Todlosen nicht nur einen loyalen Beschützer, sondern auch einen heiligen Ehepartner finden.
languages.original_text: Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.

traits.locale_text: Kibellahs Vision eines neues Weges ließ sie dem Gefühl nachgeben, das zwischen ihr und {mf|dem|der} Domin entstanden war. Sie gab ihre Rolle als Leibwächterin und Gefährtin auf, um für den Lord Captain weit mehr zu werden. Die Fäden des Blutgesponnenen Netzes zitterten, als sich eine neue Aufgabe offenbarte. Von nun an konnte ein Domin unter den Dienern des Todlosen nicht nur einen loyalen Beschützer, sondern auch einen heiligen Ehepartner finden.

languages.text: Sa vision d'une nouvelle voie poussa Kibellah à s'abandonner aux tendres sentiments qui étaient nés entre elle et {mf|le|la} Domin. Elle abandonna son rôle de garde du corps et compagne pour prendre une plus grande place à ses côtés. Les fils de la Toile de Sang frémirent alors qu'une nouvelle mission venait de lui échoir. Dorénavant, plus qu'un protecteur loyal, {mf|un|une} Domin pouvait trouver dans les rangs des serviteurs de l'Immortel une épouse sacrée.
languages.original_text: Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.

traits.locale_text: Sa vision d'une nouvelle voie poussa Kibellah à s'abandonner aux tendres sentiments qui étaient nés entre elle et {mf|le|la} Domin. Elle abandonna son rôle de garde du corps et compagne pour prendre une plus grande place à ses côtés. Les fils de la Toile de Sang frémirent alors qu'une nouvelle mission venait de lui échoir. Dorénavant, plus qu'un protecteur loyal, {mf|un|une} Domin pouvait trouver dans les rangs des serviteurs de l'Immortel une épouse sacrée.

languages.text: La visión de un nuevo camino que tuvo Kibellah la impulsó a ceder ante los sentimientos que crecían entre su Domin y ella. Renunció a su papel de guardaespaldas y compañera para convertirse en algo más para su Lord Capitán. Los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta temblaron ante el peso de un nuevo deber. Desde ese momento, su Domin no solo podría encontrar entre los sirvientes del Inmortal a fieles protectores, sino también a su cónyuge para una unión sagrada.
languages.original_text: Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.

traits.locale_text: La visión de un nuevo camino que tuvo Kibellah la impulsó a ceder ante los sentimientos que crecían entre su Domin y ella. Renunció a su papel de guardaespaldas y compañera para convertirse en algo más para su Lord Capitán. Los hilos de la Red Sanguinolenta temblaron ante el peso de un nuevo deber. Desde ese momento, su Domin no solo podría encontrar entre los sirvientes del Inmortal a fieles protectores, sino también a su cónyuge para una unión sagrada.

languages.text: キベラが見た新たな道のビジョンが、自身とドミンの間に芽生えた感情に身を委ねさせた。彼女はボディーガードや同行者としての役目を捨て、ロード・キャプテンにとってさらに重要な存在になろうとした。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸が震え、新たな任務が舞い降りたのだ。それ以降、ドミンは不死の者の従者の中から忠実な庇護者のみならず、神聖な伴侶をも見つけられるようになった。
languages.original_text: Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.

traits.locale_text: キベラが見た新たな道のビジョンが、自身とドミンの間に芽生えた感情に身を委ねさせた。彼女はボディーガードや同行者としての役目を捨て、ロード・キャプテンにとってさらに重要な存在になろうとした。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの糸が震え、新たな任務が舞い降りたのだ。それ以降、ドミンは不死の者の従者の中から忠実な庇護者のみならず、神聖な伴侶をも見つけられるようになった。

languages.text: 绮贝菈对新道路的憧憬，渐渐让位于她对行商浪人的情愫。她不再仅仅是行商浪人的保镖、同伴，而是成为了更加重要的存在。织血罗网的丝线颤抖着，新的职责降临在了教派身上。从那一刻起，秘者也加入了不死之神忠仆的行列，{mf|他|她}不仅仅是忠诚的守护者，还是神圣的伴侣。
languages.original_text: Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈对新道路的憧憬，渐渐让位于她对行商浪人的情愫。她不再仅仅是行商浪人的保镖、同伴，而是成为了更加重要的存在。织血罗网的丝线颤抖着，新的职责降临在了教派身上。从那一刻起，秘者也加入了不死之神忠仆的行列，{mf|他|她}不仅仅是忠诚的守护者，还是神圣的伴侣。

languages.text: Kibellah'nın yeni bir yola dair görüsü, Domin'le arasında alevlenen hislere kendini bırakmasına neden oldu. Lord Kaptan'ın gözünde çok daha kıymetli bir rol üstlenmek için koruma ve yoldaş rolünü geride bıraktı. Kanipi Ağı'nın iplikleri, yeni bir vazifenin gelmesiyle birlikte titreşti. O andan itibaren Domin, Ölmeyen'in hizmetkârları arasından yalnızca sadık bir koruyucu değil, aynı zamanda kutsal bir eş bulmuştu.
languages.original_text: Kibellah's vision of a new path made her give in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. She shunned her role as bodyguard and companion to become something greater for the Lord Captain. The Bloodspun Web's threads trembled as a new duty descended on it. From then on, a Domin could find among the Undying One's servants, not only a loyal protector, but also a sacred spouse.
